summary: This bill, the Retirement Investment in Small Employers Act, proposes amendments to the Internal Revenue Code of 1986. It introduces a "microemployer pension plan startup credit," effectively increasing the tax credit for small businesses (microemployers) that establish retirement plans for their employees. This aims to incentivize small businesses to offer retirement benefits by increasing the percentage and amount of the startup credit they receive. The amendment concerns tax years beginning after December 31, 2024.
